item.title: Trump attack on Rob Reiner tests the limits, even for his MAGA base
item.description: The president accused the Hollywood director, who was stabbed to death along with his wife, of having “Trump derangement syndrome.”

item.title: Democrats think they’ve found their 2026 message — and Miami just backed it up
item.description: In races across the country, Democrats focused on promises to make life more affordable — even as they offered contrasting approaches.

item.title: Can an App Replace a Personal Trainer? I Tested Nearly a Dozen to Find Out
item.description: Apps can add flexibility and freshness to your routine. Just try not to get injured.
